pullrequest.title: Support for running tests on Windows

content.raw:
Thanks Silvio. I don’t see any disruptive change in the diff. Launched a final build for testing: 

* win:

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2741)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2741/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2741/))


* mac: 

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1921)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-homebrew-amd64/1921/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1921/))


* linux

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=153)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/153/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/153/))



‌

  • mac:
